商品名稱: 女款波西米亞風花朵 T 恤復古花朵印花襯衫 多彩野花圖案 T 恤休閒植物短袖
SKU: 尺寸: Small顏色: 黑色 - 5
留言內容: The product picture makes the shirt look like a heather black relaxed-fit T-shirt, almost distressed, with cute rolled sleeves. The shirt I received is a solid black standard T-shirt, not distressed, and the sleeves are not rolled or long enough to roll. Although, it is disappointing because the contrast of the design against the heather shirt in the product photo makes the shirt look more artsy and vintage, I cannot stop wearing the shirt because it is so comfortable. I’m 5’6” and 140 lbs. I went with a small and it fits very well. The material is stretchy but does not cling. The design print is really nice and accurate to the product photos. The material and color may not be exactly what I was expecting, but I’m still happy with the shirt and find myself reaching for it regularly.

商品名稱: 女款波西米亞風花朵 T 恤復古花朵印花襯衫 多彩野花圖案 T 恤休閒植物短袖

留言內容: Super cute flower t shirt. Basic quality black shirt, with slight women fit, I would size up if you want extra room or an oversized look. The design does look plastic, but it's still cute and already received compliments.

商品名稱: 女款波西米亞風花朵 T 恤復古花朵印花襯衫 多彩野花圖案 T 恤休閒植物短袖
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 黑色 - 4
留言內容: This is a really nice t-shirt with a great design.  Unfortunately, it is too small for me.  The material is soft and the shirt is well made.  I don't feel that the black t-shirt is see through.  It is lightweight and breathable.  I really like the design with the flowers and just wish it wasn't so tight on me.  Probably should have gotten an XXL, but that wasn't available.

商品名稱: 女款波西米亞風花朵 T 恤復古花朵印花襯衫 多彩野花圖案 T 恤休閒植物短袖
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 黑色 - 5
留言內容: I've been replacing some of my old t-shirts this year and I just couldn't resist this one when I spotted it. I ordered the color/design Black-5 as I liked the stark contrast in colors and the flowers sparked my imagination. Fortunately this item did have a size chart so I was able to find the right one, size XL, for me. The fit was as expected and it matched what the chart said. As a rule I prefer my tees to be fitted but still loose enough to accommodate 'fluffy' days and this one fits the bill. It is also long enough to cover everything without hanging to my knees. The cotton/polyester blend fabric is soft, not see-through in any way, and feels sturdy. The graphic is very well adhered to the fabric and I think it will last a lot longer than the large plasticy feeling graphics that are becoming more common these days.  Washing instructions come in the form of laundry symbols on the tag, translated they state; Machine wash cold, do not bleach, iron low, dry clean with only petroleum based chemicals. Washing went well for me and I did choose to let it dry flat overnight. There was no sign of shrinking or any fading/running of the colors. This tee is comfortable to wear, fits in very well with my comfort based wardrobe including jeans, and I am looking forward to plenty of wear out of it...

商品名稱: 女款波西米亞風花朵 T 恤復古花朵印花襯衫 多彩野花圖案 T 恤休閒植物短袖
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 黑色 - 4
留言內容: I am currently around 167 lbs, 5'5" (& am almost 6 weeks postpartum). I got this "Grow in Grace" shirt in size large (Black-4). The sizing was perfect for me. It's really beautiful and soft! At first I wasn't sure I liked how "screen-printy" it looked up close, but it grew on me fast. My kids and husband all gave me compliments on the shirt! I am a fan!

商品名稱: 女款波西米亞風花朵 T 恤復古花朵印花襯衫 多彩野花圖案 T 恤休閒植物短袖
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 白色 - 5
留言內容: Kfulemai boho flower t-shirt is a very light weight t- shirt.  It’s a little thin, but not bad. I took a photo with my hand in it to show.Large measurements are:26” long before washing.  25” long after washing.20.5” from underarm seam to underarm seam.21” across at the bottomThe listing says the large is 28.7” long.  I measured from the middle of the back and got 26” long, the seller may have measured from the top of the shoulder seam to get to 28”.The listing says the bust is 40” across, it’s actually almost 41”:across, so that it close to the listing.The tag in the shirt says 65% cotton, 35 polyester.  Which what the listing says too.It is a nice lightweight casual t-shirt.  The decal does have a plastic feel. Not as thick as old decals, but it’s definitely a decal.
